description.en: Ultimate Zigbee Hub v2.1.0 - Complete unbranded Zigbee ecosystem with enhanced Johan Benz compatibility. Professional driver collection for 1500+ devices from 80+ manufacturers. Local Zigbee 3.0 operation with buffer optimization and advanced publication automation.
